GSD.product_version: versions from v4.11 to before v5.16.5
GSD.description:
rpmsg: char: Fix race between the release of rpmsg_ctrldev and cdev

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.5 by commit d6cdc6ae542845d4d0ac8b6d99362bde7042a3c7, it was introduced in version v4.11 by commit c0cdc19f84a4712cf74888f83af286e3c2e14efd. For more details please see the references link.
